title: Two children hit by car in New Jersey taken to hospital
content:
LAKEWOOD, N.J.— Two children hit by a car on route nine in New Jersey have been taken to the hospital. 
 
The accident happened around 9:30 p.m and officials have confirmed that two pediatric patients have been taken to Jersey Shore Medical Center in Neptune, New Jersey. 
 
This is a developing story, check back for updates.
